comment.author: 41399322@N07
comment._content:
Based upon the premise that the only Mayan archeological site located at the shore of the ocean is Tulum, this should be a mayan temple at the same place. 
Tulum is a mayan village now in the Caribbean sea, at the state of Quintana Roo, Mexico. Is one of the key sites at the mayan riviera. It is the most significant mayan harbor, and it was used to control the maritim commerce on the mayan territories.
It's a perfect place for the tourism. Right in the middle of the mexican Caribbean sea, has beautiful beaches, amazing views and a captivating history
